com.ftdichip.ftd2xx

Enum BitBangMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BitBangMode>
      • com.ftdichip.ftd2xx.BitBangMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BitBangMode>

    public enum BitBangMode
extends java.lang.Enum<BitBangMode>
    Enumeration of all possible Bit Bang Modes .
    Author:
    Mike Werner

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ASYNCHRONOUS
      Asynchronous Bit Bang Mode .
      FAST_OPTO_ISOLATED_SERIAL
      Fast opto-isolated serial mode.
      MCU_HOST_BUS_EMULATION
      MCU host bus emulation mode.
      MPSSE
      MPSSE mode.
      RESET
      Resets the I/O Bit Bang mode.
      SYNCHRONOUS
      Synchronous Bit Bang Mode
